name: Evil Dead: Extended Nightmare
description:
NEW Missions.... MORE Gore.... MORE Weapons.... MORE Environments than Endless Nightmare. Discover the Book of the Dead and unlock classic and new weapons, gathering courage in a frantic race to stay alive. Dare you enter the Evil Dead forest for the ultimate Deadite experience?
Features: • Intense, 1st person runner that puts you at the center of the Evil Dead universe • Access classic Evil Dead weapons from the nail gun to the chainsaw • Unlock challenging missions from the Book of The Dead • Realistic graphics and camerawork recreate the look and feel of the movie set
